enhanced_by.reason: The reset method relies on the mark method to set the bufMark, which is used to determine the position to reset to.
The reset method may need to be invoked after the buffer has been filled to ensure the buffer position is correctly reset.
The available method can be used to verify that the buffer position has been correctly reset, as it checks the buffer length and position.
The read method can be used to verify that the buffer position has been correctly reset by checking the data read after the reset operation.
